full_text: “There aren’t enough beds, medicine is difficult to come by.” Indonesia, an archipelago that stretches more than 3,000 miles along the equator, is suffering one of the world’s worst Covid-19 surges. https://t.co/JQ3S3BrKou

localize.full_text: "ベッドは足りないし、薬は手に入りにくい" 赤道に沿って3,000マイル以上伸びる列島のインドネシアは、世界でも最悪のコヴィド-19の高騰に見舞われています。https://t.co/JQ3S3BrKou
